type.how2prepare: In the zombie glass add 5 leaves of mint, 4 wedges of lime and one cap of sugar syrup; smash it to release the lime juice, add a couple of scoops of crushed ice and one shot of bacardi and stir it; add a couple more scoops of crushed ice and top up with sprite; garnish on top with a slice of lemon and mints.

In the goblet glass add 4 to 5 raspberry and one cap of berry syrup and smash it; add a couple of ice cubes and 2 shots of pink gin and stir it; add more ice and top up with sprite or soda water; garnish with your preferable berrys (strawberry, blueberry, cranberry, raspberry).

In the whisky glass add one teaspoon of brown sugar and a splash of water, 1-2 dashes of angostura bitters and mixed until the sugar dissolve; add one shot of Scotch or Bourbon, ice and stir it; top up with sprite or soda water; garnish with an orange peel.
